name: Angry Rocketeer Frenzy
description:
Angry rockeeteer frenzy - Take your trusty rocket launcher into service and destroy all the enemies of our planet in this unusual mixture of shoot 'em up and roguelite genres. Accurately blast enemies on your way, collect bonuses scattered across the desert and remember - a rescue car will appear only when all enemies are dead.


Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics
- Nice soundtrack
